title: Personal Portfolio (Static)
description: A fast, accessible, and responsive static portfolio built with semantic HTML, vanilla CSS, and minimal JavaScript. Features optimized images, SEO meta, and a lightweight build process.

title: Task Manager API
description: RESTful task management API with Node.js and Express, JWT auth, input validation, and Postgres persistence. Includes Dockerfile and CI workflow for linting/tests.

title: Web App Penetration Test — Case Study
description: Full penetration test engagement for a single-page web app: reconnaissance, authenticated testing, XSS and SSRF findings, proof-of-concept exploit code, and remediation roadmap.

title: Secure CI/CD Pipeline
description: Configured GitHub Actions CI with container scanning, dependency audit, and deployment steps to a staging environment. Hardened secrets handling and rollback strategy.

title: IoT Network Segmentation Lab
description: Lab project demonstrating network segmentation for IoT devices using virtual routers and VLANs. Includes Packet Tracer topology, firewall rules, and monitoring setup.

title: Android Bug Bounty — App Analysis
description: Static and dynamic analysis of an Android app to find insecure storage, improper session handling, and insecure communication. Includes PoCs and responsible disclosure timeline.

title: Realtime Chat (WebSocket)
description: Lightweight realtime chat app using WebSocket (ws) with rooms, presence, and message history stored in Redis. Focus on performance and minimal latency.

title: Automated Recon Toolkit
description: Small collection of Bash and Python scripts to automate reconnaissance: subdomain enumeration, port scanning, and basic vulnerability checks. Designed for learning and lab use.
